mapper.select: select * from CheckTask where Success = 1 order by UpdateTime limit 100

select count(Id) from CheckTask WHERE ( #{model.taskName} is null or #{model.taskName} = "" or TaskName LIKE #{model.taskName} ) AND ( #{model.taskGroupName} is null or #{model.taskGroupName} = "" or TaskGroupName LIKE #{model.taskGroupName} ) AND ( #{model.success} is null or Success = #{model.success} )

select count(DISTINCT t.TaskName) from CheckResult r left join CheckTask t on t.TaskName = r.TaskName WHERE t.TaskName is not null AND ( #{model.taskName} is null or #{model.taskName} = "" or t.TaskName LIKE #{model.taskName} ) AND ( #{model.taskGroupName} is null or #{model.taskGroupName} = "" or t.TaskGroupName LIKE #{model.taskGroupName} ) AND ( #{model.success} is null or t.Success = #{model.success} )

select t.*,count(r.Id) as diffs from CheckResult r left join CheckTask t on t.TaskName = r.TaskName WHERE t.TaskName is not null AND ( #{model.taskName} is null or #{model.taskName} = "" or t.TaskName LIKE #{model.taskName} ) AND ( #{model.taskGroupName} is null or #{model.taskGroupName} = "" or t.TaskGroupName LIKE #{model.taskGroupName} ) AND ( #{model.success} is null or t.Success = #{model.success} ) group by t.TaskName order by t.taskGroupName,t.taskName limit #{offset},#{limit}

select *,(select count(Id) from CheckResult where t.TaskName = TaskName ) as Diffs from CheckTask t WHERE ( #{model.taskName} is null or #{model.taskName} = "" or TaskName LIKE #{model.taskName} ) AND ( #{model.taskGroupName} is null or #{model.taskGroupName} = "" or TaskGroupName LIKE #{model.taskGroupName} ) AND ( #{model.success} is null or Success = #{model.success} ) order by taskGroupName,taskName limit #{offset},#{limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CheckTask ( CheckTask.Cursor, Running, OwnerHost, Success, Message, Comparison, SourceFetcher, TargetFetcher, Mapper, SourceDsBuilder, TargetDsBuilder, ComparisonProp, SourceFetcherProp, TargetFetcherProp, MapperProp, SourceDsBuilderProp, TargetDsBuilderProp, TaskName, TaskGroupName) VALUES ( #{cursor}, #{running}, #{ownerHost}, #{success}, #{message}, #{comparison}, #{sourceFetcher}, #{targetFetcher}, #{mapper}, #{sourceDsBuilder}, #{targetDsBuilder}, #{comparisonProp}, #{sourceFetcherProp}, #{targetFetcherProp}, #{mapperProp}, #{sourceDsBuilderProp}, #{targetDsBuilderProp}, #{taskName}, #{taskGroupName})
mapper.update: UPDATE CheckTask SET CheckTask.Running = 0, CheckTask.OwnerHost = null, CheckTask.Success = 1, CheckTask.UpdateTime = now() WHERE NOW() - interval 1 hour > CheckTask.UpdateTime

UPDATE CheckTask SET CheckTask.Running = 1, CheckTask.OwnerHost = #{ownerHost}, CheckTask.UpdateTime = now() WHERE CheckTask.Id = #{id} AND CheckTask.Success = 1 AND (CheckTask.Running = 0 OR CheckTask.OwnerHost = #{ownerHost})

UPDATE CheckTask SET CheckTask.Cursor = #{cursor}, CheckTask.Running = 0, CheckTask.OwnerHost = NULL , CheckTask.Success = #{success}, CheckTask.Message = #{message}, CheckTask.UpdateTime = now() WHERE CheckTask.Id = #{id} AND CheckTask.Running = 1 AND CheckTask.Success = 1
